Text: Euphonicmontage is the ninth studio album by Echo Orbiter.
Triplets: <Euphonicmontage
3:
--------------------
Text: Euphonicmontage:  With an experimental nature mixing a range of influences from writer Ayn Rand to The Flaming Lips, Euphonicmontage was recorded to reflect the same Cubist style of Picasso’s paintings in musical form.
Triplets:<Euphonicmontage
4:
--------------------
Text: Euphonicmontage:  The highly artistic endeavor demonstrated that Echo Orbiter "are serious about their art and it shows on their latest release, Euphonicmontage."
